for centuries the city has acted as
China's capital and today over 20
million people live within its
boundaries
throughout the country's final two
Imperial dynasties the Ming and the Qing
China's Emperors would call it home

Forbidden City
during their Reigns these men would

last

in 1911 public discontent with the

boy then only six years old
in the years that followed other man
would attempt to restore the Qing

and for more than a hundred years the
sons of Heaven who ruled China for more

today their secluded residences and

and now ordinary citizens tread every

the end of the imperial system

for over 2 000 years China was ruled by

around 20 000 BCE the climate of China

around this time the Earth was in a

and on average the world would have been

today

Sea plane would have been exposed as far

in the north the average temperature
would have been between six to nine

the result is that during this time the

of broad leaf trees

domestication refers to the process by
which wild plants and animals are
selectively bred for trees that make
them more attractive for human food
production and management
in the case of plants this process is
usually achieved through selective
cultivation where seeds with preferred
traits are increasingly reared in
artificial settings such as fields
